title: HOUR 3- Joel Klatt 081020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Joel Klatt 081020
description:
Joel Klatt says Liability is the word of the day coming from the university presidents. Joel tells Dan that the university presidents are the decision makers and their decisions are not based on the safety of the players but the liability that can be created by playing college sports in the fall.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
